ValidationRule.description: Require both Reseller & Reseller Contact filled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Business_Group__c, 'Core'), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Renewal", NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ),
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Quote Sent'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Procurement / Approval Process'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Commit'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Order in Process')),
OR( ISBLANK(Reseller_Contact__c) && NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller__c)), ISBLANK(Reseller__c) && NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller_Contact__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Both Reseller and Reseller Contact fields must be filled.
